name: Retrieve the Relationship Management Details for Customer with Direct SME RM

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000930000403000"

When I Retrieve the Relationship Management Details for CIF Key: <cifKey>
| cifKey | notes |
| 0100000930000403000 | Customer with Direct SME RM |

Then the following data Relationship Management Information should be returned
| relationshipManager | rmStaffID | treatmentFlag | rmEmail | rmPhone | lifetimeValue | marketSegment | treatmentStrategy | mgmtLocation |
| Avril Herlihy | 72649 | S | direct.sme@aib.ie | (0818) 506000 |  |  | Business Premier | SME_RM |

children.description: Validate response: | relationshipManager | rmStaffID | treatmentFlag | rmEmail | rmPhone | lifetimeValue | marketSegment | treatmentStrategy | mgmtLocation | | Avril Herlihy | 72649 | S | direct.sme@aib.ie | (0818) 506000 | | | Business Premier | SME_RM |
